modName: The Bless Up MMMeme invasion shrine
summary: This Mod adds a shrine of MMMeme and bless up a picture of snoop lion/dogg to the sleeping giant inn in riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod adds a shrine of MMMeme and bless up a picture of snoop lion/dogg to the sleeping giant inn in riverwood. 
=========================================================================================
How to download?
download with nexus mod manager or
put the MMMemes.bsa in your skyrim/data folder
Were are the paintings?
the sleeping giant inn in riverwood. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this adds to my shrine series this goes perfect with the lil wayne shrine i highly suggest you download this mod and the lil wayne mod.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
what this mod adds
New Paintings 
New sounds
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
credits to artsanix for the painting mesh resource.
author: Grimweeder
